https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Andrew, like everyone else, worries about problems, rejoices when he helps his loved ones, and looks forward to his birthday. The cartoon unobtrusively exposes myths about people with Down syndrome, showing them interesting, talented and multifaceted personalities. Andryusha's Diary
